main event: Observers reported seeing two orange colored objects with white wings flying side by side, and a third object joined them while moving in formation.
interesting points: The objects were observed traveling at a rapid rate and maintained a horizontal plane before turning south,The weather conditions were clear with no clouds and no moon during the observation,It is possible that the witnesses observed jet aircraft during night training flights,The witness described the objects as being bright orange and resembling aircraft,No photographs were taken during the sightings.
sighted object: two orange colored objects with slight white wings
witness description: civilians, including a son and a night operator at a telephone office
